features.title: You're All Set!
features.description: Here's what you can do with Prospeo:

calendar.title: Smart Calendar
calendar.description: Manage your property viewings and appointments with our integrated calendar system. Sync with Cal.com for seamless scheduling.

calls.title: AI Call Management
calls.description: Let your AI agent handle property inquiries 24/7. Review call transcripts, recordings, and analytics.

analytics.title: Performance Analytics
analytics.description: Track your property performance, lead conversion rates, and AI agent effectiveness with detailed analytics.

properties.title: Property Management
properties.description: Easily manage your property listings, update details, and track status changes.
